message_1: Suppose you want to encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" using the Rail fence cipher technique with a key of 3. What will be the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" using the Rail fence cipher technique with a key of 3, we arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

Now, we read the letters row by row to get the encrypted message:

HOLEWLDLO

So, the encrypted message is "HOLEWLDLO".
